definition[0]: to admit that you were wrong to say something
example[0]: You’d better take back that remark!
definition[1]: to take something you have bought back to a shop because it is not suitable
example[1]: If the shirt doesn’t fit, take it back.
definition[2]: to make you remember a time in the past
example[2]: Having the grandchildren around takes me back to the days when my own children were small.
